sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"辩论，争论，说理"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: argue, quarrel, debate, dispute, discuss, reason
means: argue ：指提出理由或证据为自己或自己一方的看法或立场辩护，着重说理、论证和企图说服。
quarrel ：指两人之间或两个团体之间不友好的、吵吵嚷嚷地大声争论某事，尤指"吵嘴、吵架"。
debate ：侧重指意见等对立的双方之间正式或公开的争辩。
dispute ：侧重对分歧进行激烈或热烈的争论或争辩，带一定感情色彩，常隐含"各持已见"或"争论不休"意味。
discuss ：最常用词，指就某一或某些问题表明观点、看法等，以便统一认识，解决问题。
reason ：指据理力争以说服对方或求得对问题作更深入的研究。

sentence.Network_en: The Politburo has been meeting in Peking to discuss the situation.
sentence.Network_cn: 政治局已在北京召开会议讨论形势。

sentence.Network_en: Senior politicians met today to discuss the future of European economic unity.
sentence.Network_cn: 高级政要今天会晤，探讨欧洲经济一体化的未来。

sentence.Network_en: The magazine's aim is to discuss topical issues within a Christian framework.
sentence.Network_cn: 该杂志的宗旨是在基督教框架下讨论时下的热门话题。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 七年级英语单词表 ... classmate 同班同学 discuss 讨论;议论 report 报告;汇报.
Swedish Word List ... ord = word 词 orda om = discuss,discuss 谈论，谈论 ordbok = dictionary,vocabulary 字典，词汇量.
compel的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... later 以后, 随后... discuss 讨论, 论述 ... production 制造, 生产, 产物.
字典中谋字的解释 ... (3) 通“媒”。媒介[ media] (4) 计议;商议[ confer;discuss] (6) 图谋;营求[ plot;conspire;seek].

list.abs: 在讨论（Discussion）字段中，添加评论，也可以和评论的作者进行聊天会话或发送邮件。在快速信息（Quick Information）部分 , 可 …
Movie Guide - MyEntertainmentHall ... Currently Airing Dramas 目前播出电视剧 Discussion 讨论区两个爸爸 / Two Fathers.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'dispel, disperse', also 'examine by argument'): from Latin discuss- 'dashed to pieces', later 'investigated', from the verb discutere, from dis- 'apart' + quatere 'shake'

entry.def: If people discuss something, they talk about it, often in order to reach a decision.

example.ex: I will be discussing the situation with colleagues tomorrow...
example.tran: 明天我会和同事们讨论一下情况。

example.ex: The cabinet met today to discuss how to respond to the ultimatum.
example.tran: 内阁今天开会商量如何应对这道最后通牒。

entry.def: If you discuss something, you write or talk about it in detail.

example.ex: I will discuss the role of diet in cancer prevention in Chapter 7...
example.tran: 我会在第7章详细论述日常饮食在抗癌中的作用。

example.ex: Coming up after the news, Dan Schorr discusses the state of the presidential campaign.
example.tran: 新闻之后，丹·肖尔将带来对总统竞选活动的详细评述。

means.word_mean: 1. to consider or examine in speech or writing;

sentences.sentence: "The article covered all the different aspects of this question"

means.word_mean: 2. speak with others about (something); talk (something) over in detail; have a discussion;

auth_sentence.content: British blues pioneers discuss their love of the Blues.
auth_sentence.res_content: British blues pioneers discuss their love of the Blues.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: British blues pioneers discuss their love of the Blues.

auth_sentence.content: We discuss the fraught relationship between religion and politics.
auth_sentence.res_content: We discuss the fraught relationship between religion and politics.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We discuss the fraught relationship between religion and politics.

auth_sentence.content: I would like to discuss interactive periodic tables etc.
auth_sentence.res_content: I would like to discuss interactive periodic tables etc.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I would like to discuss interactive periodic tables etc.

stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+cuss摇动,敲打,震+ion动作或状态→全部摇动
per自始至终+cuss摇动,敲打,震+ion动作或状态→一直震动
re一再+percussion[n.敲打;碰击;冲突;震动]→一再引起震动
dis分开+cuss敲打→把[问题]分开敲→讨论

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"分开,分离,去掉"; 2. 表示"否定,不,消失掉"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不,消失掉+graceful优美的→adj.可耻的, 不名誉的
dis否定,不,消失掉+honest诚实的→adj.不诚实的
dis否定,不,消失掉+incline愿意→adj.不愿的
dis否定,不,消失掉+passionate有激情的→adj.平心静气的
dis否定,不,消失掉+solute溶解→溶解开来→没有限制→放荡的
dis否定,不,消失掉+son声音+ant……的→声音不[好听]
dis分开,分离,去掉+cern搞清,确定+ment表名词→确定不同之处→有眼光

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不利, 不利条件, 缺点, 劣势
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不,消失掉+advantage优点,有利条件→n.不利, 不利条件, 缺点, 劣势
dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+may能→不能做事→沮丧;参考:五月能种粮食,所以叫May
dis否定,不,消失掉+order顺序→没有顺序
dis否定,不,消失掉+proof证实→不证实→反证
dis分开,分离,去掉+course课程,教程→分解课程→论述→论文
dis分开+play=ply重叠→打开折叠→显示出来
dis分开,分离,去掉+affect感情→感情分开→疏远
dis分开,分离,去掉+burse钱包→从钱包中分出→支出
dis分开,分离,去掉+crimin分辨→ate→分辩开
dis分开,分离,去掉+cuss敲打→把[问题]分开敲→讨论
dis分开,分离,去掉+miss送→分开送出→解散
dis分开,分离,去掉+part部分→分成部分→分开
dis分开,分离,去掉+pens花费+e→分开花费→分配[财富等]
dis分开,分离,去掉+semin种子+ate表动词→散布[种子]
dis分开,分离,去掉+tend伸展,拉→分开伸展→膨胀
dis分开,分离,去掉+tract拉→把[心]拉开→分心
dis不+adapt使适应→v.使不适应
dis否定,不,消失掉+appear出现→不出现→消失
dis否定,不,消失掉+arm武装→去掉武装
dis否定,不,消失掉+courage勇气→v.使失去勇气
dis否定,不,消失掉+cover盖→把盖揭开→发现
dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+like喜爱→不喜爱
dis否定,不,消失掉+organize组织→解散组织
dis否定,不,消失掉+pel推→推开→驱除

Sentence.sentence: What will the speakers discuss later?
What did the speaker most probably discuss last time
What did the speaker probably discuss before coming to this part of the talk
He also said that he could not discuss discounts to universities for bulk purchases.
To discuss the content of a project report.

Applicants are asked to describe an ethical dilemma they've faced and its impact on them, or discuss a public issue of special concern to them, or tell of a fictional character or creative work that has profoundly influenced them.

means.word_mean: 谈论, 讨论; 商量, 论述

sentences.en: College students always discuss the news.
We will discuss what to teach during the next term.
sentences.cn: 我们将讨论下学期要教什么。

sentences.en: We're here to discuss Ann's joining the club.
sentences.cn: 我们这次碰头是为了商量安入会的事。

sentences.en: We discussed when we should go.
sentences.cn: 我们商量什么时候动身。

jushi.english: Let us go back to the subject we were discussing.
jushi.chinese: 让我们回到刚才讨论的题目吧。

jushi.english: The newspapers are discussing the coming election.
jushi.chinese: 各家报纸现在正谈论未来选举事宜。
